english: Hey! The icon on the left is called a windturbine. Windturbines can be put in motion because of the their height in combination with the wind. Because of this they generate green energy!
It's your job to greenify Alkmaar by completing objectives and solving puzzles throughout the levels.
Solve fun puzzles that teach you about green energy solutions.
Complete objectives by solving puzzles and completing parkour.

Welcome! This is the first level, called The Meent. Your goal is to greenify the city!. Search for for puzzles and solve them. If you don't know where to find the puzzles or what to do find some helpers and talk with them! Good luck!
